problems.title: Rearrange Positive and Negative Alternatively
problems.description:
Rearrange positive and negative numbers alternatively in a given array. If positive numbers are more, they appear at the end. If negative numbers are more, they too appear at the end of the array.

Input Format:
First line contains n, the size of array.
Second line contains n space-separated integers.

Output Format:
Print "The rearranged array is:" followed by the rearranged array with space-separated values.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
11
-4 8 -5 -6 5 -9 7 1 -21 -11 19

Sample Output
The rearranged array is:
-4 8 -5 5 -6 7 -9 1 -21 19 -11

Explanation:
Positive and negative numbers are arranged alternatively. Remaining numbers (more negatives) appear at the end.
hintsList: Separate positive and negative numbers into two arrays.
Fill positions alternatively starting with negative, then place remaining numbers at the end.
